sentences.en: Earlier reports were unable to confirm that there were any survivors.
sentences.cn: 早先的报道无法证实是否有幸存者。

sentences.en: For two weeks, the cash machine was unable to dispense money.
sentences.cn: 该自动取款机已有两个星期不能提供现金。

sentences.en: He is unable to travel much because of old age.
sentences.cn: 他年事已高，不能频繁出游。

sentences.en: He was unable to contain his own destructive feelings.
sentences.cn: 他无法抑制自己消极的情绪。

sentences.en: He was unable to sit still for longer than a few minutes.
Many areas in the country'sinterior are unable to report Aids cases immediately.
sentences.cn: 该国内地的很多地区无法即时报告艾滋病病例。

sentences.en: Oil majors need not fear being unable to sell their crude.
sentences.cn: 大型石油公司无需担心原油销售不出去。

sentences.en: She seemed to be unable to rouse herself to do anything.
sentences.cn: 她似乎打不起精神去做任何事情。

sentences.en: She stared at her own bloodied hands, unable to think or move.
sentences.cn: 她盯着自己流血的双手，呆呆地愣住了。

sentences.en: The British driver was unable to hang on to his lead.
sentences.cn: 英国车手没能保住自己的领先地位。

sentences.en: The clay court was slippery and he was unable to move freely.
sentences.cn: 红土网球场很滑，他不能自如地移动。

sentences.en: The military may feel unable to hand over power to a civilian president next year.
sentences.cn: 军方可能觉得无法在明年把政权移交给一位民选总统。

sentences.en: The striker was unable to find his scoring touch.
sentences.cn: 那个前锋找不到进球的感觉。

sentences.en: These people, usually men, seem unable to relate to the opposite sex.
sentences.cn: 这些人，通常为男性，似乎不懂得如何跟异性相处。

sentences.en: Unable to restrain herself, she rose and went to the phone.
sentences.cn: 她没能克制住自己，起身走向电话。

sentences.en: When the children misbehaved she was unable to cope.
sentences.cn: 孩子们调皮捣蛋的时候她管不了。
